Plot: The Black Soulstone essence is screaming for vengeance and release. Before the artifact can be sealed away forever, Malthael, the Angel of Death manifests in the mortal realms with a deadly new purpose. And so begins the end of all things.
Title: Diablo III: Reaper of Souls
Actors: Athena Karkanis, Dorian Harewood, Mary Elizabeth McGlynn, Gideon Emery
